span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. 警戒线： a line or ring of police, soldiers, or vehicles preventing people from entering an area
【例】 a cordon of police 警察围成的警戒线
【近】 perimeter
【考法 2】 v. 围城一道防线： to form a protective or restrictive cordon around
【例】 cordoned off the area around the explosion scene 在爆炸现场周边设置警戒线
【近】 close, obstruct, block
【记】 cord 绳
